question_text: Which of the following best describes a thin client in a desktop virtualization setup?
answer_options: A device with a full OS and local storage used to manage VDI servers
A lightweight client device that connects to a virtual desktop hosted remotely
A smartphone used to connect to local virtual machines
correct_answer: A lightweight client device that connects to a virtual desktop hosted remotely
explanation: Thin clients are minimal endpoints used to access remotely hosted virtual desktops.
